website_summaries.verdict: Spray nozzle delivers a steady stream under high pressure to clean brake parts fully.
pros: Uses a chlorine-free formula for use in all 50 states
Dries faster than some other brake cleaning fluids
Will work on all parts of the brake system successfully
Removes contaminants like brake fluid, brake dust, and grease
cons: Smaller can than some other options, so it's a little more expensive per ounce

customer_reviews.title: Works amazing! Blasts away any type of grease / brake buildup
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Can definitely tell this has some solvents in it, so try not to inhale or get all over yourself. However, this stuff does an amazing job! I used it when changing out my front brakes. Worked so well that I bought another can for my back brakes! Will blast away any kind of dirt/grease/brake dust/ or other buildup from your various brake components, screws, caliper slides, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Vidakovich

customer_reviews.title: About the same
customer_reviews.text: Removes grease, dust, scrapings and leaves the spot clean enough for the brakes to work properly. Had another can from a local auto parts store, and it was ditto. I just wanted to know if there was a difference and there wasn't.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick E. McfaddenTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Used two cans while replacing all four rotors and pads on my BMW X5. Brakes work better then when new !
customer_reviews.author: Priti Dalal

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is like magic, but it does go quick.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Did it's Job.
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Used one can to change 2 rear breaks on a 2005 Toyota Corolla. Minimal left but was generous with spraying it.
customer_reviews.author: Julian Klauz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: works well, also works well to clean things other than brakes
customer_reviews.author: Larry D H

customer_reviews.title: they loved it, no more brake
customer_reviews.text: given as a gift, they loved it, no more brake noise
customer_reviews.author: maco

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just got it and is really cool and work perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: edgar

customer_reviews.title: I've never seen anything clean as great as this product
customer_reviews.text: I've never seen anything clean as great as this product! One quick spray to the brakes and a quick wipe and they're almost good as new! Also, I found out that brake fluid, one of the most difficult fluid to clean, stands no chance against this cleaner. Very handy to have this in the garage!
customer_reviews.author: Peter G.

customer_reviews.title: When dealing with brakes and brake fluid as I do ...
customer_reviews.text: When dealing with brakes and brake fluid as I do daily in the shop, that stuff can leave a mess or create a problem, But with this brake cleaner just spray it down after your job is finished and leave the worry behind.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

product_meta.title: Throttle Muscle TM8487 - Brake Parts Cleaner 50 State Compliant Non-Chlorinated 13 Oz
product_meta.description: 13 Oz Throttle Muscle Professional Formula Non-Chlorinated Brake Cleaner is a high power spray that removes brake fluid, grease, road grime and oil instantly! 50 State VOC compliant, this cleaner is safer for aluminum, it also leaves no residue or chlorinated solvent run-off. This product is the only legal, VOC compliant, brake and parts cleaner that can be shipped into California. Formulated to quickly remove brake dust, brake fluid, grease and other contaminants without damaging the brake systems, including ABS! Not SCAQMD compliant.
feature_bullets: High power spray with included nozzle
Ultra low VOC - 50 staate compliant formula with no chlorinated solvents, not SCAQMD compliant.
Cleans and degreases brake linings, cylinders, drums, rotors, clutches, CV joints, etc

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars36 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
